channel.title: [569/578] Benevolence
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/flvits.jpg[/img]
[LEFT]Revision: Currently 569 loading 578 may change later [SIZE=4] Programming Team:[/SIZE] [IMG]http://th935.photobucket.com/albums/ad198/bailey_067/th_o_crown.gif[/img] Emily
[SIZE=4]What is Benevolence? [/SIZE] Benevolence means devotion to do good, it is related to the word love, which is exactly what you are going to be doing while either watching updates, playing, or just looking at the pictures. Benevolence is going to be a multi world server, with a pvp/bounty world, and a main world. The main world will include skills, minigames, and much much more. The bounty world will have total war across the map. With only a few safe spots (ex: banks) you are going to have to fight for your life if you wish to keep what you take. Overall both the main world and the bounty world will have a stable economy, which will include the Grand Exchange. You can expect to see every skill trainable almost exact with runescape, and many of your favorite minigames (ex: Castle Wars, Clan Wars, Barrows, ect). You will be able to hang out, talk, skill, pk, and even engage in quests. I will only be adding a few to start, but I will assure they will be thoroughly involved, and will be well worth the time.
I will be programming this project solo, and will be working on it when time permits, in other words I will be working on this in my free time, so don't expect this to progress insanely fast. Everything other then the basic source, will be written by me, if any codes are not written by me, they will be included in the credits, with what they contributed. Let the fun begin.
[IMG]http://s.ytimg.com/yt/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif[/img][IMG]http://s.ytimg.com/yt/img/pixel-vfl3z5WfW.gif[/img] Youtube Channel: [URL=http://tinyurl.com/23voygm]http://tinyurl.com/23voygm[/URL] [SIZE=4] Credits:[/SIZE]
[ul][*]DarkSniper & Leanbow (For, Client + World List) [*]Graham (For, Base & Framework, although i have improved it alot(: )[/ul]
[SIZE=4]Questions:[/SIZE]
Will this be released?
[ul][*]Nope, sorry at the moment I have decided that I will first host this and see how it goes, I will eventually release open source down the road though.[/ul]
Does this have the new Prayers?
[ul][*]Yes, look at the pictures, that is exactly what you can expect (:[/ul]
Current Base: Benevolence 569, remade Graham's original source
[SIZE=4]Pictures:[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/o0431f.jpg[/img]

[ul][*]Login [*]World List [*]Walking [*]Public Chat & Rights [*]Ancient Curses [*]Mapdata Loading [*]Equipping and Un-equipping [*]Banking + Bank Tabs [*]Private Chat [*]Player vs Player Combat (1 Click) [*]Following [*]Ranging W/ Distance [*]Specials [*]Ancient Prayers Combat effects [*]Npcs [*]Grand Exchange [*]Player vs Npc Combat [*]New Wilderness System [*]Force Equipping [*]Castle Wars base [*]Fletching [*]Item option 2(Dismantling godswords mainly & summoning)[/ul]
[SIZE=4] [/SIZE] [/LEFT] [/CENTER]
Will Be Updating this thread less often then the one on rl, but it will get updated occasionally.

Good luck, are you looking for more programmers?

@ Everyone else, thanks

Not very big updates today, basically started shops

Also finished herblore, and started on crafting. Plan to add as many ways to train as possible (goal is to have same features as runescape, but this is very time consumingâ€¦and i need a life
